name: DOODOORIBBLE - SCRIBBLE GAME JAM 2021
description:
SCRIBBLE JAM SUBMISSION 

all of graphics drow by me

sounds are mine

and developer also me:))

THEME: Scribble / Doodle  - DONE CHALLENGE: [ What did you say? ]: All text in your game must be a made up language. -DONE [ Never Stop ]: The player is always moving.   -NO                                                               [ 2 Bit Color ]: You can only use 4 different colors.                                                   -DONE [ Windows Window ]: Moving the game window as a game mechanic.      -DONE  [ What did you say? ]: All text in your game must be a made up language.-DONE     [ Keyboard Broken ]: You can only use your mouse as an input.             -DONE                      [ In Orbit ]: The game has a top down perspective.                   -DONE                                        [ Palindrome ]: The game must end the same way it started.                            -NO [ Spin me round ]: Rotation is the primary game mechanic.                               -DONE [ Boing! ]: Everything is bouncy! :D -DONE                                                                                    [ /tp ]: Use teleporters to move around.   -DONE                                                                        [ Gotta go ]: The game only last 10 seconds( or every level).   -NO                           [ Bodyguard ]: The player is invincible but has an other character to protect.-NO [ No Design ]: The game levels are procedurally generated.                              -NO [ Voice actor ]: All sound effects are made using your own vocal cords.    -DONE [ Disinformation ]: The game is filled with lies and deceit.  -NO
